MemoryInfobox.name: Tainted Sacrifice
MemoryInfobox.description: 'A priestess told of how a 'Mercenary|misthios' had stolen altar offerings for a bandit camp. Angered by the theft, she claimed to prefer the offerings be destroyed.'

General_Description: '''Tainted Sacrifice''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: A priestess asked Kassandra help with dealing with a theft.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Our sacred altar has been raided by a rogue [[mercenary]] working with bandits! Seeking a champion of the [[Twelve Gods|gods]].'' She sought out the priestess and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You left a note on the board. What's going on?'' *'''Woman:''' ''A mercenary has been raiding sacrifices from our altar and sharing them with a nearby bandit camp. I'd sooner see our sacrifice to the gods destroyed than squandered on those vermin.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''And you're hoping I'll kill all the bandits?'' *'''Woman:''' ''That's right.'' (Accept - I'll hunt the outlaws.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll help you. You have my word.'' *'''Woman:''' ''You'll be doing divine work.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll be back when everything's taken care of.'' Kassandra left the priestess and hunted down the bandits before returning to her to claim the reward.
Section_Outcome: Kassandra helped the priestess, and was rewarded for this.
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
